segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing at the sink right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This woman is calmly drying a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is absolutely gushing out of the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the sink and overflowing onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, for crying out loud!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a growing puddle, yet her expression is entirely neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frankly infuriating to watch her serene dishwashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the noise of the running water must be quite loud.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of negligence is just baffling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's practically inviting a disaster with that rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at her to turn off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential water damage is going to be significant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess she's allowing to happen around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
